data.name: 团长别生气 Demo
data.detailed_description: "Yes, Sir" is a mix of battle chess strategy and roguelike. As a leader, you need to recruit members with distinctive personalities and lead your members to fight powerful enemies in a secret world. A new journey is waiting for you.
data.about_the_game: "Yes, Sir" is a mix of battle chess strategy and roguelike. As a leader, you need to recruit members with distinctive personalities and lead your members to fight powerful enemies in a secret world. A new journey is waiting for you.
data.short_description: "Yes, Sir" is a mix of battle chess strategy and roguelike. As a leader, you need to recruit members with distinctive personalities and lead your members to fight powerful enemies in a secret world. A new journey is waiting for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
